title: Update site contact email address

requirements.text: Update the site contact email address from the current value in `frontend/src/config/site.ts` (`siteConfig.contact.email`) to exactly `hello.quickbeeagency,com`, and ensure all UI locations that use `siteConfig.contact.email` (including mailto links and any displayed email text) reflect this new value.
acceptanceCriteria: The mailto link in the footer uses `mailto:hello.quickbeeagency,com`.
The email shown on the Contact page uses `hello.quickbeeagency,com` and its mailto link uses `mailto:hello.quickbeeagency,com`.

constraints: Do not change backend logic or persistence for this request.
Do not auto-correct or reformat the user-provided email string; use it exactly as provided (`hello.quickbeeagency,com`).
nonGoals: Adding new contact methods (e.g., additional phone numbers, addresses).
Changing any non-email copy, layout, or styling beyond what is necessary to reflect the updated email address.
